CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing AgroChain Management relative to HarvestLink Systems?
SRP.A: AgroChain Management is {above} HarvestLink Systems in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing AgroChain Management relative to FarmGate Transit?
SRP.A: AgroChain Management is {above} FarmGate Transit in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Verdant Distribution relative to CropConnect Logistics?
SRP.A: Verdant Distribution is {below} CropConnect Logistics in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total food waste?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {HarvestLink Systems}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total food waste?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {AgroChain Management}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is FarmGate Transit's maximum Food Waste in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: FarmGate Transit's maximum Food Waste is in {1971}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Verdant Distribution's minimum Food Waste in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Verdant Distribution's minimum Food Waste is in {1976}.

NC.Q: Was the total Food Waste in 1976 higher or lower than in 1977?
NC.A: The total food waste in 1976 was {higher} than in 1977.

NC.Q: Was the total Food Waste in 1976 higher or lower than in 1985?
NC.A: The total food waste in 1976 was {lower} than in 1985.

NC.Q: Was the total Food Waste in 1971 higher or lower than in 1999?
NC.A: The total food waste in 1971 was {lower} than in 1999.

NC.Q: Was the total Food Waste in 1993 higher or lower than in 2000?
NC.A: The total food waste in 1993 was {lower} than in 2000.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Verdant Distribution} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did TerraTrade Network and CropConnect Logistics first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: TerraTrade Network and CropConnect Logistics first exchanged leading positions in {1972}.
